entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18.
